"Oh? Oh my!!": "Huh?- Uwaaaah! You scared me!"
"Heheheh, there's no need to be scared. Don't you know that Lisa's a fully-fledged ARKS?"
"No offense, but whether you're ARKS or not, I'm pretty sure anyone would be surprised to find someone standing right behind them..."
"If Lisa was in your position, she'd shoot them right away."
"That goes way beyond being surprised!"
"Heheheh... This one smells like fresh meat. Is she your new friend?"
"1. I want you to get along with her."
"2. You never change, do you?"

"Well, she doesn't know if other people see it that way."
"Of course not. 2 years have passed, but people don't change that easily. Not even after a hundred years."
"And who are you, young lady?"
"My name's Hitsugi, the small child is Aru and..."

"Umm... That's-"

"Well, whoever you are,
if you're a friend of <%me>,
then it doesn't really matter."
"Ah... I see."
"How about this? To show how well we're getting along, let's go and shoot each other! What do you say?"

"Shooting each other...?
WHAT?! I mean- I don't have those kinds of interests!"

"Well, I might just end up shooting you anyway. Hehe, heheheh, heheheheheh..."
